programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: In Poland's capital city of Warsaw, the Slavic culture is rich and the hearty food sticks with you through the winter. From pierogi to zapiekanka to paczki, Andrew Zimmern explores the iconic eats that Poles hold as tradition.(c)

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: In a city celebrated for its beloved beverages, Dublin, Ireland's, food does not disappoint. Andrew Zimmern examines edible Irish icons from smoked salmon, soda bread and stew to boxty, black pudding and, of course, Guinness.(c)

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern is in El Paso, where Texas meets Mexico on the border as well as in the kitchen. The city is filled to the brim of its 10-gallon hat with Tex-Mex cuisine as well as Mexican classics.(c)

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew checks out the vibrant and flavorful fusions of Antigua Guatemala. This locale is home to sacred food traditions and cultural mashups of Mayan and Spanish heritage. His adventure includes colorful enchiladas, tiny tamales and traditional sweets.(c)

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew heads to Frankfurt where he samples everything from the classic frankfurter and apple wine to pork shoulder with sauerkraut and hand cheese with music.(c)

programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern shows off the tempting flavors of Cartagena, Colombia. From fried fish and sizzling egg arepas to bedroom-boosting fruits and seafood stews, the taste of the coast infuses every bite.(c)

programme.title: Man v. Food

programme.title: Man v. Food

programme.title: Unique Sweets
programme.desc: We're on the hunt for the best sweet treats New York City has to offer. Sweets by Chloe is a cute vegan bakeshop that's creating giant cookies and fudge cakes that are rich and moist, creamy and chocolatey.

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate
programme.desc: The best part of any dish is what holds it all together: the crust! Chef Beau MacMillan's favorite pot pie in Phoenix, Arizona, takes on Duff Goldman's seafood pie pick in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate
programme.desc: There's no better way to end a meal than with these delicious dishes. In New York City, Martha Stewart gushes over the most irresistible piece of lemon meringue she's ever had.

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate
programme.desc: Ali Khan makes a beeline for an over-the-top pistachio chicken salad creation in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: In Poland's capital city of Warsaw, the Slavic culture is rich and the hearty food sticks with you through the winter. From pierogi to zapiekanka to paczki, Andrew Zimmern explores the iconic eats that Poles hold as tradition.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: In a city celebrated for its beloved beverages, Dublin, Ireland's, food does not disappoint. Andrew Zimmern examines edible Irish icons from smoked salmon, soda bread and stew to boxty, black pudding and, of course, Guinness.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern is in El Paso, where Texas meets Mexico on the border as well as in the kitchen. The city is filled to the brim of its 10-gallon hat with Tex-Mex cuisine as well as Mexican classics.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew checks out the vibrant and flavorful fusions of Antigua Guatemala. This locale is home to sacred food traditions and cultural mashups of Mayan and Spanish heritage. His adventure includes colorful enchiladas, tiny tamales and traditional sweets.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew heads to Frankfurt where he samples everything from the classic frankfurter and apple wine to pork shoulder with sauerkraut and hand cheese with music.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern shows off the tempting flavors of Cartagena, Colombia. From fried fish and sizzling egg arepas to bedroom-boosting fruits and seafood stews, the taste of the coast infuses every bite.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb travels to Minnesota's largest city, where he tries a legendary burger that's become a regional icon, noshes on a gigantic brunch meal served with its own food Ferris wheel and takes on a massive four-pound banh mi behemoth.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey's latest delicious detour brings him to Saint Paul for an indoor food truck park, a timeless diner and a terrible twosome of crepes and Thai rolled ice cream.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb lands in Worcester, MA, where he slurps down some radical ramen, indulges in peanut butter cup French toast and takes on a rack of deep-fried ribs with the heat of a million Scoville units.

programme.title: Man v. Food Nation
programme.desc: Casey Webb's epic eating expedition brings him to Baltimore for an out-of-this-world diner, a classic crab feast and a four-pound pho fight.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: In Casey's years of facing off against food, he's taken on his fair share of heat. Casey's counting down the hottest, culminating in a challenge so spicy it may crack the Scoville scale and the number.

programme.title: Man v. Food
programme.desc: Armed with a serious love of food and years of experience in the restaurant business, Casey Webb travels the country in search of America's most delicious dishes and ultimate eating challenges.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: A historian is hired to create a Christmas display at the Plaza. While working, she learns that fate has prevailed and teamed her up with a handsome decorator to help bring the display, and their romance, to life.(c)

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A world-travelling photographer takes some time off at Christmas to care for her grandmother. While there, she meets her neighbour, who needs help caring for his young nephew, and love develops.(c)

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: A self-professed 'Christmas hater' is locked in a department store on Christmas Eve. There, she meets a woman who claims to be her 'guardian angel' and shares with her three Christmas ghosts.(c)

programme.title: Christmas Wishes and Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: A woman is hired to decorate an estate building a few weeks before Christmas. While there, she works to break down the wall between her and the business owner, all while keeping the holiday spirit alive.(c)

programme.title: With Love, Christmas
programme.desc: An ad executive and her uptight co-worker must create the ultimate Christmas commercial. To complicate things, they are also each-others Secret Santa.(c)

programme.title: A Cheerful Christmas
programme.desc: As a 'Christmas Coach' a woman provides her clients with all the magic of the holidays. In order to make her new clients vision a success, she is tasked with working with their son, to find out all of their holiday traditions.(c)

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: A Christmas amateur finds himself in charge of his family's holiday celebration. Desperate for help, he enlists an expert in all things Christmas and together, they discover what's truly important in life.(c)

programme.title: Double Holiday
programme.desc: A woman is tasked with throwing her companies holiday party, with her nemesis. The two must work together to mingle work and traditions to make the party a success.(c)

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur invents a new dating app designed to help singles find dates to events. She personally tests it out in the weeks before Christmas and is connected with a like-minded individual whom she's already dated, several times.(c)

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: A woman loses her job and beau on the same day and reluctantly accepts a position in Alaska. When she gets the position she originally hoped for, she must choose between a life she's always wanted and her new life in Alaska.(c)

programme.title: Holiday Date
programme.desc: A man poses as a former boyfriend for a woman when she returns home for the holidays. As her family celebrates Christmas, he requests they also celebrate Hanukah and a merry ruse is born.(c)

programme.title: Christmas Town
programme.desc: A woman leaves behind a life in Boston to embark on a new adventure. Unbeknownst to her, she ends up on an unexpected detour that changes both her life, and her romantic future.(c)

programme.desc: Lindsay Wrinkles always knew that her father had a short temper, but she never expected to be on the run from him when she was only 14. As she runs from hideout to hideout desperate to evade him, Lindsay wonders what will happen if he ever finds her.(c)

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: A young woman getting ready to be a bridesmaid at her best friend's wedding is found viciously stabbed to death in her own home.(c)

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: A young woman about to start a Hollywood career mysteriously disappears off Interstate 10.(c)

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: A young woman is found shot to death off the side of a dirt road. Police hope their best clue, the bullet found at the scene, will unmask her killer.(c)

programme.title: Dark Waters: Murder in the Deep
programme.desc: Malcolm and Lindy Robertson leave their family behind to sail the open seas of retirement together. Lindy eventually learns to love Malcolm's dream of sailing to Thailand but paradise soon turns into an unfathomable nightmare.

programme.title: Dark Waters: Murder in the Deep
programme.desc: Kelley Branam's husband Jake is a Miami charter boat captain with high aspirations. Jake works long hours to support his new family but Kelley's suspicions run deep. Out of the blue, she decides to join Jake on a charter and is never heard from again.

programme.title: Dark Waters: Murder in the Deep
programme.desc: Living near Lake Minnetonka, MN with his wife and daughter, Jeff Skelton thinks his life is perfect until rumors of infidelity surface. Everyone has their breaking point. Jeff will do whatever it takes to keep his family from being pulled apart.

programme.title: Dark Waters: Murder in the Deep
programme.desc: Two couples arrive on the same remote island in the Pacific looking for paradise. Soon, all that either of them finds is trouble. When one couple emerges months later, the FBI will spend years deciphering exactly what happened.

programme.title: Dark Waters: Murder in the Deep
programme.desc: Serena Karlan leaves everything she knows behind to join her boyfriend, retired NBA champion Bison Dele, aboard his catamaran in the South Pacific. Serena is the happiest she's ever been, until Dele's estranged brother surfaces and throws them off course.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Sherry Shafer never had a good relationship with her younger brother, Brian Britton, but she never expected to lose everything because of him. Today, all she has left is the fear that one day he will return to finish what he started 26 years ago.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Though Ronald Hawkins and Candace Sims knew that their son Robbie was different from an early age, they were unprepared for the violent act that Robbie would commit, a crime that shook the nation. Now they talk about it all on camera.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Kat Harris and Marla Kreuger each loved Lawrence Harris in her own way. Each dismissed his dark obsession as childish and strange, but harmless. Neither of them realized he was preparing to sacrifice innocent lives for his evil purpose.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Ronald and Patty had always seen the signs that their older brother, Bernard Eugene Giles, had a darker side. When Gene finally lets loose the monster lurking inside, they couldn't help but wonder how things had gone so wrong.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here

programme.title: Dirt Every Day
programme.desc: Fred and Dave blow the cobwebs off of two of their favorite muscle cars, the Mad Maxxis and the Dirt Pacer. They'll head to the Motor City of Detroit for some urban off-roading.(c)

programme.title: Dirt Every Day
programme.desc: When Fred buys an International Scout with a camper on top, it's time for an adventure. But first, he and Dave head to Anything Scout to fix up the old overlander and transform it into a trail machine with a house on the back.(c)

programme.title: Junkyard Gold
programme.desc: Steve visits Cadillac King and uncovers a massive '68 Fleetwood and a '75 Calais six-door limo. He'll also try to bust the notion that all Caddys are gigantic with a '79 Seville Milan roadster and a '93 Allante.(c)

programme.title: Junkyard Gold
programme.desc: Steve delivers a lesson about the birds and bees -- Plymouth Road Runners and Dodge Super Bees. In a private yard, he finds what might be the very last Super Bee of all, along with a Road Runner with colors fit for 'The King.(c)

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Body work and paint can be intimidating, but Roadkill Garage's Steve Dulcich has no fear of hammers, dual-action sanders or body filler. He gears up and attacks David Freiburger's 1970 Plymouth known as the Crop Duster.(c)

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: The Crop Duster is a back-to-basics street and strip machine with big-block power. It's running its quickest quarter mile ever, running in the 11s in no-prep track conditions.(c)

programme.title: Faster With Finnegan
programme.desc: John Andrade Jr. from Street Outlaws joins the guys in a messy battle, when a '75 dirt-track Camaro goes head-to-head with a big-block-powered Toyota mud truck on a makeshift drag strip down the center of a mud park.(c)

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: Known for its sizzling performance and smooth body style, the '69 Pontiac GTO is one of the fastest cars of its time. Now, Joe gives it his signature twist with rad body mods and new power train that will have its super wide tires smokin' hot.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: Ron's classic 1967 Plymouth Barracuda needs a motor, trans lines, and a lot of work under the hood. Recovering from recent heart surgery, only the Garage Squad can give Ron the help he needs to get this monster of Mopar back together again.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: Danielle's 1968 Chevy Camaro 327 convertible was her dream car, but now it's her nightmare needing an overhaul from bumper to bumper. She lost all hope.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: Restoring a Split Window Corvette runs into unexpected problems. The owner of a '63 Corvette never had time or money to keep it running. After dozens of swap meets searching for the parts to rebuild the car, he's still nowhere close.(c)

programme.title: GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey preps the Stunt Double's bed with fender flairs, a roll bar and some blazing spotlights to keep that 'Fall Guy' look with a modern twist. Then, it's on to the Gladiator build, where Stacey makes sure the search and rescue rig can see in the dark.(c)

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne resurrects a 1962 Jaguar XKE SI 3.8 Flat Floor Roadster once owned by Today Show host, Dave Garroway. And what do an OSCA MT4 race car, a million-dollar 8-liter Bentley and a questionable '71 Siata Spring have in common? Carini of course.(c)

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: The guys head to Angelo's shop in Pennsylvania for an insane project, cramming an entire second drivetrain into the rear of a Chevy Impala. Then it's off to a drag strip in New Jersey to put their creation through its paces.(c)

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis makes his way to the Highlands Motoring Festival in North Carolina. Plus, he talks weatherstripping solutions for a variety of applications.(c)

programme.title: Overhaulin'
programme.desc: The Overhaulin' team has pulled off the ultimate prank: stealing Chip Foose's beloved '56 truck right out from under his nose and overhauled it over the course of four months! A new side of Chip is revealed as the prankster gets pranked.(c)

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy's vision for big ideas leads to a huge opportunity for the shop. If he pulls off the build as promised, he could secure future business for years to come. And with a little help from his dad, he has the opportunity to boost his own collection.(c)

programme.title: Car Fix

programme.title: Little People, Big World

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Miss USA Erin Brady is ready to find her dream dress, but she must also please her mother-in-law.(c)

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
